definitions.definition: To make a series of high-pitched sounds; to twitter , chirp or chatter .
examples: It was a beautifully sunny day and beetles could be heard chittering loudly in the rose garden by the side of the path made out of antique bricks.

definitions.definition: To shiver or chatter with cold.

main_definition: To make a series of high-pitched sounds; to twitter , chirp or chatter .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , Scotland ) To shiver or chatter with cold.
